Ah yea, I see the problem. In that case, I think I am after a nicer interface for adding new aggregation methods. Maybe the `aggregation_method` could be passed into 'tf.gradients` as a function/class with the right signature instead?

Regardless, I think I can do what I want (a sketch -- possibly online -- of the grads that returns the principle component) if I just hack in another option to `_AggregatedGrads`.
